title: Corpus Scriptorum Christianorum Orientalium: Scriptores Iberici
additional-notes: This is a Belgian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Issues of this serial may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.

This is a subseries of the larger 'Corpus Scriptorum Christianorum Orientalium' series.  The overall series started earlier than this subseries did, and includes public domain volumes and volumes that are free to read online.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
